languages.text: Залп корабельных орудий взрыл скалистую поверхность планеты, вдребезги разрушив горную породу вместе с судном. Ущелье, подле которого еще недавно лежали останки корабля, превратилось в усеянный обломками кратер. Команда Вольного Торговца подняла на борт несколько металлических пластин для ремонта собственного судна.

traits.locale_text: Залп корабельных орудий взрыл скалистую поверхность планеты, вдребезги разрушив горную породу вместе с судном. Ущелье, подле которого еще недавно лежали останки корабля, превратилось в усеянный обломками кратер. Команда Вольного Торговца подняла на борт несколько металлических пластин для ремонта собственного судна.

languages.text: A salvo of the flagship's cannons has torn up the rocky surface of the planet, pulverising the cliffs along with the crash-landed vessel. The ravine under the ledge upon which the wrecked voidship was perched has turned into a crater littered with debris. The Rogue Trader's crew has salvaged a couple of metal plates that could be used for flagship repairs.
languages.original_text: Залп корабельных орудий взрыл скалистую поверхность планеты, вдребезги разрушив горную породу вместе с судном. Ущелье, подле которого еще недавно лежали останки корабля, превратилось в усеянный обломками кратер. Команда Вольного Торговца подняла на борт несколько металлических пластин для ремонта собственного судна.

traits.locale_text: A salvo of the flagship's cannons has torn up the rocky surface of the planet, pulverising the cliffs along with the crash-landed vessel. The ravine under the ledge upon which the wrecked voidship has perched on, has turned into a crater littered with debris. The Rogue Trader's crew has salvaged a couple of metal plates that could be used for the flagship repairs.

The ravine under the ledge upon which the wrecked voidship was perched has turned into a crater littered with debris. The Rogue Trader's crew has salvaged a couple of metal plates that could be used for flagship repairs.

The ravine under the ledge upon which the wrecked voidship was perched has turned into a crater littered with debris. The Rogue Trader's crew has salvaged a couple of metal plates that could be used for flagship repairs.

A salvo of the flagship's cannons has torn up the rocky surface of the planet, pulverising the cliffs along with the crash-landed vessel. The ravine under the ledge upon which the wrecked voidship was perched has turned into a crater littered with debris. The Rogue Trader's crew has salvaged a couple of metal plates that could be used for flagship repairs.

languages.text: 虚空舰舰炮齐鸣，撕裂了行星的岩石表面，粉碎了悬崖与迫降的飞船。原本位于虚空舰正下方的峡谷，如今已经变成了碎片四散的弹坑。行商浪人的船员回收了一部分金属板，可以用来修理旗舰。
languages.original_text: A salvo of the flagship's cannons has torn up the rocky surface of the planet, pulverising the cliffs along with the crash-landed vessel. The ravine under the ledge upon which the wrecked voidship was perched has turned into a crater littered with debris. The Rogue Trader's crew has salvaged a couple of metal plates that could be used for flagship repairs.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰舰炮齐鸣，撕裂了行星的岩石表面，粉碎了悬崖与迫降的飞船。原本位于虚空舰正下方的峡谷，如今已经变成了碎片四散的弹坑。行商浪人的船员回收了一部分金属板，可以用来修理旗舰。

languages.text: 旗艦の大砲が惑星の岩肌を引き裂き、不時着した船とともに崖を粉砕した。難破したヴォイドシップが腰掛けていた岩棚の下の渓谷は、瓦礫が散乱するクレーターと化していた。自由開拓者のクルーが、旗艦の修理に使えそうな金属板をいくつか引き揚げてきた。
languages.original_text: A salvo of the flagship's cannons has torn up the rocky surface of the planet, pulverising the cliffs along with the crash-landed vessel. The ravine under the ledge upon which the wrecked voidship was perched has turned into a crater littered with debris. The Rogue Trader's crew has salvaged a couple of metal plates that could be used for flagship repairs.

traits.locale_text: 旗艦の大砲が惑星の岩肌を引き裂き、不時着した船とともに崖を粉砕した。難破したヴォイドシップが腰掛けていた岩棚の下の渓谷は、瓦礫が散乱するクレーターと化していた。自由開拓者のクルーが、旗艦の修理に使えそうな金属板をいくつか引き揚げてきた。

languages.text: Una salva de cañones de la nave insignia ha desgarrado la superficie rocosa del planeta, pulverizando los acantilados junto con la nave estrellada. El barranco bajo el saliente sobre el que se posaba la nave del vacío se ha convertido en un cráter lleno de escombros. La tripulación {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente ha rescatado un par de placas de metal que podrían servir para reparar la nave insignia.
languages.original_text: A salvo of the flagship's cannons has torn up the rocky surface of the planet, pulverising the cliffs along with the crash-landed vessel. The ravine under the ledge upon which the wrecked voidship was perched has turned into a crater littered with debris. The Rogue Trader's crew has salvaged a couple of metal plates that could be used for flagship repairs.

traits.locale_text: Una {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salva{/g} de cañones de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} ha desgarrado la superficie rocosa del planeta, pulverizando los acantilados junto con la nave estrellada. El barranco bajo el saliente sobre el que se posaba la nave del vacío se ha convertido en un cráter lleno de escombros. La tripulación {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente ha rescatado un par de placas de metal que podrían servir para reparar la nave insignia.

languages.text: Eine Salve aus den Kanonen des Flaggschiffs hat die felsige Oberfläche des Planeten zerrissen und die Klippen samt dem abgestürzten Raumschiff pulverisiert. Die Schlucht unter der Kante, auf dem das havarierte Raumschiff lag, hat sich in einen Krater voller Schutt verwandelt. Die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hat einige Metallplatten geborgen, die für Reparaturen am Flaggschiff verwendet werden könnten.
languages.original_text: A salvo of the flagship's cannons has torn up the rocky surface of the planet, pulverising the cliffs along with the crash-landed vessel. The ravine under the ledge upon which the wrecked voidship was perched has turned into a crater littered with debris. The Rogue Trader's crew has salvaged a couple of metal plates that could be used for flagship repairs.

traits.locale_text: Eine Salve aus den Kanonen des Flaggschiffs hat die felsige Oberfläche des Planeten zerrissen und die Klippen samt dem abgestürzten Raumschiff pulverisiert. Die Schlucht unter der Kante, auf dem das havarierte Raumschiff lag, hat sich in einen Krater voller Schutt verwandelt. Die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hat einige Metallplatten geborgen, die für Reparaturen am Flaggschiff verwendet werden könnten.

languages.text: Une bordée tirée par les canons du vaisseau amiral dévaste la surface rocailleuse de la planète, pulvérisant les falaises ainsi que le vaisseau accidenté. Le ravin au sommet duquel il était perché n'est plus qu'un vaste cratère jonché de décombres. L'équipage parvient néanmoins à récupérer quelques plaques de métal susceptibles de servir pour réparer le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: A salvo of the flagship's cannons has torn up the rocky surface of the planet, pulverising the cliffs along with the crash-landed vessel. The ravine under the ledge upon which the wrecked voidship was perched has turned into a crater littered with debris. The Rogue Trader's crew has salvaged a couple of metal plates that could be used for flagship repairs.

traits.locale_text: Une bordée tirée par les canons du vaisseau amiral dévaste la surface rocailleuse de la planète, pulvérisant les falaises ainsi que le vaisseau accidenté. Le ravin au sommet duquel il était perché n'est plus qu'un vaste cratère jonché de décombres. L'équipage parvient néanmoins à récupérer quelques plaques de métal susceptibles de servir pour réparer le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
